mapper.select: SELECT t.startdate,t.enddate,t.id,t.opttime,t.currency,g.name gname,u.name uname,m.name market FROM t_amz_settlement_acc_statement t LEFT JOIN t_amazon_group g ON g.id=t.groupid LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u ON u.id=t.operator LEFT JOIN t_marketplace m ON m.marketplaceId=t.marketplaceid where t.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} order by t.opttime desc
